alert.note: Alert for Mille Lacs; Morrison (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 1:32PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Mille Lacs and east central Morrison Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 131 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Saint Mathias to near Vineland. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Vineland around 140 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Isle, Wahkon and Lastrup. This includes U.S. Highway 169 between mile markers 216 and 229. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
